answerText: prions[10] Perhaps the most famous human disease caused by a prion is this one that comes in a classic form which is not related to mad cow disease as well as a new variant form that is related to it.
heading: ACF Regionals |2012 | Alabama + Yale C + Alberta | 1 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name these abnormally folded proteins that can cause diseases such as scrapie and mad cow.
